author: Helene Braun
title: U.S. President Donald Trump’s Social Media Firm Truth Social To Launch Spot Bitcoin ETF
description: NYSE Arca, an arm of the New York Stock Exchange, submitted paperwork with the Securities and Exchange Commission on Tuesday.
content: NYSE Arca, which is part of the New York Stock Exchange, has filed paperwork with the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) to launch a fund issued by U.S. President Donald Trumps media company Tr… [+791 chars]
